plot: Two women in dysfunctional marriages are transformed from weak-willed, immature brats into strong adults by the intervention of a mysterious grocery bagger.
title: Bad Wives
plot_es: Two women in dysfunctional marriages are transformed from weak-willed, immature brats into strong adults by the intervention of a mysterious grocery bagger.
plot_en: Two women in dysfunctional marriages are transformed from weak-willed, immature brats into strong adults by the intervention of a mysterious grocery bagger.
